dataTemplate.name: XXPAVNDI
dataTemplate.description: OD PB SC Vendor Request Form report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT od_sc_vendor_name VENDOR_NAME, od_sc_factory_number factory, od_sc_vend_address VENDOR_ADDRESS, od_sc_vend_phone VENDOR_PHONE, od_sc_vend_fax VENDOR_FAX, od_sc_vend_email VENDOR_EMAIL, od_sc_audit_agent PRIMARY_MERCHANT, od_sc_vendor_tax_id vendor_tax_id FROM q_od_pb_sc_vendor_master_v WHERE plan_id=:p_plan_id AND occurrence=:p_ocr
